# Copilot Instructions for GeometricMedicalPhantoms.jl

For detailed coding standards, development workflow, and project-specific guidelines, please refer to the [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) file in the root directory of this repository.

This file contains comprehensive instructions including:
- Julia best practices and naming conventions
- Comments and documentation guidelines
- Code structure and formatting requirements (Runic.jl)
- Testing requirements with independent module spaces
- Build, test, and benchmark commands
- Package structure and design patterns
- Common tasks for adding phantoms and geometries
- Performance considerations and optimization guidelines
